text: Miles of Fire () is a 1957 Soviet movie directed by Samson Samsonov.Кино на ТВОГНЕННЫЕ ВЕРСТЫ It stars Igor Savkin, Margarita Volodina, and Mikhail Troyanovsky. ==Actors== *Igor Savkin (Grigory Fyodorovich Zavragin) *Margarita Volodina (Katerina Gavrilovna) *Mikhail Troyanovsky (Dr. Shelako) *Vladimir Kenigson (Sergei Beklemishev) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1957 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:Soviet movies Category:Movies directed by Samson Samsonov
title: Miles of Fire
